message.body: Hey! Happy new year!!! Nain wants me to tell you that she sent your birthday check to your summer address, she thinks... Dig?
I follow. Same address then. Same address now. We're straight. Thank ya very much. And happy new year to you. Heading back to school soon?
College head as of this December. Don't know when im going back though.
I assumed! Oh my gosh congrats! I'm such a heathen mess! You'll be great!
Haha, thanks. I'm just going to let my mind wander and become its own heathen mess.
